languages.text: "В стенах сих пред ликом Движущей Силы мирские звания и титулы ничтожны. Куда больше за вас говорят деяния, ибо путь ваш сюда окроплен кровью святотатцев".
"Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."
languages.original_text: "В стенах сих пред ликом Движущей Силы мирские звания и титулы ничтожны. Куда больше за вас говорят деяния, ибо путь ваш сюда окроплен кровью святотатцев".

traits.locale_text: "Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."
"Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."
"Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."
"Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."
"Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."
"Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."

languages.text: "In diesen Mauern gelten weltliche Titel nichts vor der Antriebskraft. Eure Taten jedoch sprechen lauter als Titel, denn Euer Weg hierher ist voller Blutspritzer von Schändern."
languages.original_text: "Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."

traits.locale_text: "In diesen Mauern gelten weltliche Titel nichts vor der Antriebskraft. Eure Taten jedoch sprechen lauter als Titel, denn Euer Weg hierher ist voller Blutspritzer von Schändern."

languages.text: « Entre ces murs, les titres ne représentent rien face à la Force Motrice. Vos actions sont bien plus importantes, car le chemin qui vous a {mf|mené|menée} ici est éclaboussé du sang des profanateurs. »
languages.original_text: "Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."

traits.locale_text: « Entre ces murs, les titres ne représentent rien face à la Force Motrice. Vos actions sont bien plus importantes, car le chemin qui vous a {mf|mené|menée} ici est éclaboussé du sang des profanateurs. »

languages.text: “在这里，世俗的头衔在源力面前微不足道。然而，你们的行为远远比头衔更能说明问题，因为你们通往这里的道路上，洒满了亵渎者的鲜血。”
languages.original_text: "Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."

traits.locale_text: “在这里，世俗的头衔在原初动力面前微不足道。然而，你们的行为远远比头衔更能说明问题，因为你们通往这里的道路上，洒满了亵渎者的鲜血。”

languages.text: 「この壁の内側では、世俗の肩書きなど原動力の前では何の意味も持たない。そうではなく、あなたの行いこそが肩書きよりも大切なのだ。なぜなら、あなたの道は冒涜者たちの血で塗れているのだから」
languages.original_text: "Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."

traits.locale_text: 「この壁の内側では、世俗の肩書きなど原動力の前では何の意味も持ちません。そうではなく、あなたの行いこそが肩書きよりも大切なのです。なぜなら、あなたの道は冒涜者たちの血で塗れているのですから」

languages.text: «Dentro de estos muros, los títulos mundanos no son nada ante la Fuerza Motriz. Sus actos, por otro lado, son más valorados que sus títulos, pues su camino está salpicado con la sangre de los profanadores».
languages.original_text: "Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."

traits.locale_text: «Dentro de estos muros, los títulos mundanos no son nada ante la Fuerza Motriz. Sus actos, por otro lado, son más valorados que sus títulos, pues su camino está salpicado con la sangre de los profanadores».

languages.text: "Bu duvarların arasında, Devinim Gücü'nün huzurunda dünyevi ünvanların kıymeti yoktur. Lakin icraatların söze hacet bırakmıyor. Buraya, kutsalımızı çiğneyenlerin kanlarına bulanmış bir yolda yürüyerek geldin."
languages.original_text: "Within these walls, worldly titles are nothing before the Motive Force. Your deeds, however, speak far louder than titles, for your path here is sprayed with the blood of desecrators."

traits.locale_text: "Bu duvarların arasında, Devinim Gücü'nün huzurunda dünyevi ünvanların hiçbir kıymeti yoktur. Lakin icraatların, ünvanından daha fazla önem arz ediyor. Buraya, kutsalımızı ayaklar altına alanların kanlarıyla boyalı bir yolda yürüyerek geldin."
